translation.detailNoFiles: No files or please waiting execution to complete
translation.indexComment: Please separate multiple indexes with a comma.
translation.qaListDesc: Here is a list of questions uploaded in this batch.
translation.promptCreateTips: New prompt will override current prompt, are you sure to continue?
translation.promptDeleteTips: Delete the prompt will reset to the system default prompt.
translation.chatbotCreateTips: New chatbot will override the current chatbot, are you sure to continue?
translation.chatbotDeleteTips: Delete the chatbot will reset to the system default chatbot.
translation.intentionDeleteTips: Delete these executions will delete all the relative data in the system.
translation.toAvoidTips: To avoid accidental deletions we ask you to provide additional written consent.
translation.deleteAlert: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
translation.deleteIntentionFailed: These data could not be deleted because it is being used by other indexes.

header.reSignInDesc: You have logged out of your account. Please click 'Reload' to log in to the web console again

validation.repeatIndex: This index is already used, please change the index

validation.maxTokensRange: The maximum number of tokens must lager than 0

translation.subTitle: Streamlined Workflow for Building Agent-Based Applications
translation.projectDescription: This solution guidance enables customers to build Generative AI applications for Contact Center use scenarios
translation.awsSolutionGuidance: Guidance for Cloud Contact Center for FSI

feat1.name: Agent Assistance with Generative AI
feat1.desc: The generative AI-based agent assistance provides real-time intelligent suggestions, helping agents quickly respond to customer needs by analyzing intent, offering templates, and enhancing service efficiency and satisfaction.

feat2.name: Call Center Integration
feat2.desc: This solution seamlessly integrates into existing systems, enhancing intelligent service capabilities with fast responses and knowledge updates, reducing operational costs, improving customer experience, and supporting consistent multi-channel service.

feat3.name: Management and governance
feat3.desc: This solution helps clients build an enterprise knowledge base, enabling support teams to continuously accumulate and update knowledge. By automatically compiling FAQs and responses, it keeps the knowledge base up-to-date, allowing agents to resolve customer issues more efficiently and enhancing overall service quality.

feat4.name: Multilingual Support
feat4.desc: This solution supports multilingual functionality, helping financial institutions operate globally. With real-time multilingual translation and intelligent reply suggestions, agents can seamlessly serve customers in different languages, effectively enhancing cross-regional customer experience and service efficiency.

case1.name: Contact Center Intelligence and Intelligent Agent
case1.desc: Contact Center Intelligence and Intelligent Agent
